Detailed Description

This is the main class, which provides the distribution of information on the status of an application component.

An instance of this class must be present at each location where monitoring is required.

Don't forget register Source metatype information in Qt with:

    qRegisterMetaType< Como::Source > ( "Como::Source" );

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Como::Source::Type

Type of the source.

Enumerator:
String  Source with string value.
Int  Source with integer value.
Double  Source with double value.

ServerSocket *  serverSocket = 0,
QObject *  parent = 0 
)

Parameters:
type  Type of the source.
name  Name of the source.
typeName  Name of the type of the source.
value  Initial value of the source.
desc  Description of the source.
serverSocket  Server socket. If not null then source will send out the information about itself.
parent  Parent object.

Member Function Documentation

void Como::Source::initSource (  )  [virtual]

Init server socket with this source.

When this method invoked server socket initialize his internal state and send message to all clients about new source.

void Como::Source::deinitSource (  )  [virtual]

Deinit server socket with this source.

When this method invoked server socket deinitialzie his internals state with this source and send message to all clients about source deinitialization.

const QVariant & Como::Source::value (  )  const

Returns:
Value of the source.

void Como::Source::setValue ( const QVariant &  v  ) 

Set value of the source.

If serverSocket was defined in the constructor then information will send out.

m_dateTime updates automatically to current system date and time.

Emit valueChanged( const QVariant& ).

void Como::Source::setValue ( const QString &  v  ) 

Set value of the source.

This function is provided for convenience.

If type of the source is not String then nothing will happen.

void Como::Source::setValue ( int  v  ) 

Set value of the source.

This function is provided for convenience.

If type of the source is not Int then nothing will happen.

void Como::Source::setValue ( double  v  ) 

Set value of the source.

This function is provided for convenience.

If type of the source is not Double then nothing will happen.

ServerSocket * Como::Source::serverSocket (  )  const

Returns:
Server socket.

void Como::Source::setServerSocket ( ServerSocket *  socket  ) 

Set server socket.

If server socket was defined before this operation then this source will be deinitialized with previous server socket and initialized with new one.
